main event: A silvery object was observed coming out of a cloud, hovering in the air, and then shooting straight up and out of sight over several minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared to be stationary in the air at first, leading the witness to initially think it was a satellite.
The witness watched the object perform this behavior of coming out of the cloud, hovering, and then shooting straight up several times.
The witness compared the sighting to a recent television program about flying saucers, indicating they were familiar with the topic.
The witness was located in Pasco, Washington.
The report was submitted to Project Blue Book, the U.S. Air Force's official UFO investigation program.
